name: TransportEvent

properties.name: EVENT_LOOPSTARTED
properties.description: This event is fired when looping was switched on.

properties.name: EVENT_LOOPSTOPPED
properties.description: This event is fired when looping was switched off.

properties.name: EVENT_PAUSESTARTED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has paused to play.

properties.name: EVENT_PAUSESTOPPED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has unpaused to play.

properties.name: EVENT_PLAYERSTARTED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has started to play.

properties.name: EVENT_PLAYERSTOPPED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has stopped to play.

properties.name: EVENT_RECORDSTARTED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has started to record.

properties.name: EVENT_RECORDSTOPPED
properties.description: This event is fired when the currently active player has stopped to record.

properties.name: EVENT_SKIPSELECTIONSTARTED
properties.description: This event is fired when skip selection was switched on.

properties.name: EVENT_SKIPSELECTIONSTOPPED
properties.description: This event is fired when skip selection was switched off.

description: This events propagates changes of the Audition transport like e.g. playback started.
